roleset.name: cover with a mask
roleset.note: MASK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mask' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from mask.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: instrumental subject
example.text: Analysts said the results were as expected, but several added that the earnings masked underlying weaknesses in several businesses.

example.name: passive with instrument
example.text: Real estate analyst Lloyd Lynford says [the Northeast's distress]-1 is masked *trace*-1 by relatively low vacancy rates.

example.name: lunchtime
example.text: John masked the bread with peanut butter.
